alert.note: Alert for Cass; Menard; Morgan (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 5:31PM CDT until March 31 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Menard County in central Illinois... Southeastern Cass County in west central Illinois... Northeastern Morgan County in west central Illinois... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Jacksonville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado near Chapin at 5:25 PM CDT . IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * The tornado will be near... Literberry around 540 PM CDT. Ashland around 550 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 61 and 62, and near mile marker 71. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
